channel.title: How to fix this ? [2 QUESTIONS]
channel.description:
1. How can I fix safepotting ?
2. How can I make it so my players needs at least 3 items to PK ?
Thanks.

item.title: How to fix this ? [2 QUESTIONS]
item.dc:creator: @bluefire7913 bluefire7913
item.description:
@bluefire7913 wrote:

hmmm my delta witch i am codding right now my npcs cant be safed. I have an idea. Just make them walk in a certen path were the people safe them at then when they try to safe them they will walk to them then they will run and the npc’s will just chase them. “or ::noclip might help not to sure tho”

item.title: How to fix this ? [2 QUESTIONS]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“bluefire7913, post:2, topic:355234”]whats safepotting?

and for 3iteams up just put if you go pvp you must have more then 3iteams and make it so if some reports some one they get a prize so they want to report people for doing it so then you dont need to worry/but i will still look in to it[/quote]

Safepotting is like I added NPC Clipping (Fix) and people can attack a NPC without getting attacked (They hide besides a tree and can attack the NPC in range, magic and the NPC get attacked but don’t hit you).

Read full topic

item.title: How to fix this ? [2 QUESTIONS]
item.dc:creator: @Omnitrix Omnitrix
item.description:
@Omnitrix wrote:

[quote=“bluefire7913, post:2, topic:355234”]whats safepotting?

and for 3iteams up just put if you go pvp you must have more then 3iteams and make it so if some reports some one they get a prize so they want to report people for doing it so then you dont need to worry/but i will still look in to it[/quote]

He doesn’t want a Rule, he wants a line of code that they can’t attack unless they have 3 items…

I’m sorry bud, But I can’t really explain how to do that.

Read full topic
